channel.title: Vestibule :: Suggestions for "Millions of Apps: What we've Learned"
channel.description: A list of all suggestions made for "Millions of Apps: What we've Learned"

item.title: Suggestion from Nikos Dimitrakopoulos (@)
item.description: I love the topic and the description but I would really appreciate it if we could get some feedback from the proposal author regarding @John's question: "Are these patterns Heroku-specific only"?

item.title: Suggestion from Daniel Lobato Garc√≠a (@eLobato)
item.description: Honestly I liked the proposal, but not the namedrop.. it goes against the spirit of this CFP.

item.title: Suggestion from Bamboo (@b4mboo)
item.description:
@svs: Most likely. ;-)

I'm gonna stick with what I wrote in reply to the other talk (which dropped the same company name): The topic and description alone would have been sufficient to get me interested.

So you got my vote (as did the other proposal), even though I don't want to see both of them.

I'd still appreciate it, if you could remove the company name. I really liked the anonymous approach Euruko was going for. This feels a bit like a cheap shot.

item.title: Suggestion from Siddharth Sharma (@)
item.description: Would this talk largely be covering the same ground as http://12factor.net?
